name: docusaurus-plugin-typedoc
description: A Docusaurus v2 plugin to build API documentation with TypeDoc.

scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn run lint && yarn run build && yarn run test
scripts.build-and-test: yarn run build && yarn run test
scripts.test:init: rm -rf test/site && npx @docusaurus/init@latest init test/site classic
scripts.test:demo:start: rm -rf test/site/docs/api yarn run build && cd test/site && yarn run clear && yarn run start
scripts.test:demo:build: rm -rf test/site/docs/api && yarn run build && cd test/site && yarn run clear && yarn run build && yarn run serve

author: Thomas Grey
